main event: On December 30, 1952, a UFO was sighted over Hokkaido Island, Japan by crew members of a BTSC aircraft.
interesting points: The object was described as spherical, varying in color from red to white, and not rotating., It was observed moving at a speed considerably greater than the aircraft for about 5-10 minutes., The pilot made an attempt at interception but was unable to close in on the object., Concurrent sightings of other unidentified lights were reported in the area., A detailed report suggests the planet Venus may have contributed to some of the observed phenomena.
sighted object: a spherical object changing colors from red to white
witness description: crew members of a BTSC aircraft, including an Air Force colonel
